value:
My, my, there are quite a number of
handsome devils here. But none so
handsome as myself, it seems.

Valbar lost his family to a band of
pirates. His cause is my own, and that
includes his revenge.

Humm, you're looking a bit pale...
Fatigue is the sworn enemy of beauty,
so get some rest.

Would you show me around town?
I need to pick up some new clothes,
new accessories, some...$k$pWell, let's just say keeping up
appearances is a full-time job.

Oh, I always keep up on the latest
trends. I need to know what's in style
here. It wouldn't do to fall behind.

You're $Nu?
I bring a message to you from
$Nf.

Is there no one who can
best me?

Well, I suppose this is the
expected result.

This feels funny...
And not the ha-ha kind.

Oh, my, I have been made
stronger? Why, sometimes
I even startle myself!

I'm Leon, an archer by trade. And
let me start by saying, you have
pulled me away from Valbar...$k$pI will not forgive you if any harm
should befall him in my absence.

Hello, $Nu!
I've prepared some tea. Would you
care to join me?$k$pI must admit, I was anxious when you
first summoned me here.$k$pUgh, don't laugh—it's rude! I may not
look worried, but I have my fair share
of concern, same as anyone else.$k$pAnyway, you've proven yourself more
than capable, so I suppose I don't
mind sticking around.$k$pTo be honest, I am eager to return
home... But that can wait, I think...$k$pCare for another cup?
えーいっ
Like this?
Damn you!
きゃああああーっ！
Hands off!
We're done here.
Excuse me?
Get lost!
Madness.
Mmm.
Hey, hey, now. No more of that.
I'm a friendly fellow, but not the touchy-feely type. All right?
Is it really so terrible to be this stylish?
Valbar is my dearest friend. If he's happy, I'm happy.
All this fighting can't be good for my skin.
Oh, Valbar. I wonder what you're up to right now.
You're a bit of a riddle, aren't you? Good. I like riddles.
Sure.
Oh?
Let's go.
